//æœ€å¤§ä¿ç•™æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡ MaxAge: 30, //æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶ä¿ç•™å¤©æ•° Compress: false, //æ˜¯å¦å‹ç¼©å¤„ç† }) errorFileCore := zapcore.NewCore(encoder, zapcore.NewMultiWriteSyncer(errorFileWriteSyncer,zapcore.AddSync(os.Stdout)), highPriority) //ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªåŠä¹‹åçš„å‚æ•°ä¸ºå†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ—¥å¿—çº§åˆ«,ErrorLevelæ¨¡å¼åªè®°å½•errorçº§åˆ«çš„æ—¥å¿— coreArr = append(coreArr, infoFileCore) coreArr = append(coreArr, errorFileCore) log = zap.New(zapcore.NewTee(coreArr...), zap.AddCaller()) //zap.AddCaller()ä¸ºæ˜¾ç¤ºæ–‡ä»¶åå’Œè¡Œå·ï¼Œå¯çœç•¥ log.Info("hello info") log.Debug("hello debug") log.Error("hello error")} å‚è€ƒæ–‡ç« åœ¨Goè¯­è¨€é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨Zapæ—¥å¿—åº“ - çŸ¥ä¹ (zhihu.com) golangé«˜æ€§èƒ½æ—¥å¿—åº“zapé…ç½®ç¤ºä¾‹ - ExplorerMan - åšå®¢å›­ (cnblogs.com)

entry.title: ä»¥å¤ªåŠä»£å¸å¼€å‘
entry.content: æœ¬æ–‡ä½œè€…ï¼šé™ˆè¿›åšåšå®¢åœ°å€ï¼šhttps://jian1098.github.ioCSDNåšå®¢ï¼šhttps://blog.csdn.net/c_jianç®€ä¹¦ï¼šhttps://www.jianshu.com/u/8ba9ac5706b6è”ç³»æ–¹å¼ï¼šjian1098@qq.com ç¯å¢ƒè¦æ±‚ ä»¥å¤ªåŠå…¬é“¾æˆ–ç§æœ‰é“¾ ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰ä»¥å¤ªå¸çš„é’±åŒ…ï¼šç”¨äºæ”¯ä»˜æ‰‹ç»­è´¹å’Œæ¥æ”¶ä»£å¸ EthereumWalletå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ éƒ¨ç½²åˆçº¦åœ¨Ethereum Walletå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¸­ç‚¹å‡» CONTRACTS => DEPLOY NEW CONTRACT ,ç„¶åFROMå¡«ä½ çš„ä»¥å¤ªåŠåœ°å€ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«ä¸Šã€‚åœ¨ä¸‹æ–¹SOLIDITY CONTRACT SOURCE CODEçš„ç¼–è¾‘æ¡†ä¸­å¡«å…¥å®˜æ–¹çš„åˆ›å»ºä»£å¸çš„åˆçº¦ä»£ç å®˜æ–¹ä»£ç çš„åœ°å€ï¼šhttps://ethereum.org/token ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä»£ç å¤åˆ¶åˆ°Ethereum Walletä¼šæŠ¥â€Defining constructors as functions with the same name as the contract is deprecated.â€çš„é”™è¯¯ï¼ŒæŠŠç¬¬5è¡Œä»£ç ä¸­çš„åˆçº¦åå­— TokenERC20 æ”¹ä¸º å…¶ä»–åç§°å³å¯ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ Tokenã€‚ å¦å¤–å¦‚æœä»£å¸çš„å°æ•°ä½æ•°ä¸æ˜¯18ä½ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¿®æ”¹ä»£ç ç¬¬9è¡Œä¸­çš„ public decimals ä¸ºä½ éœ€è¦çš„å°æ•°ä½æ•° å®Œæ•´ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹  solidity ^0.4.16;interface tokenRecipient { function receiveApproval(address _from, uint256 _value, address _token, bytes _extraData) external; }contract Token { // Public variables of the token string public name; string public symbol; uint8 public decimals = 18; // 18 decimals is the strongly suggested default, avoid changing it uint256 public totalSupply; // This creates an array with all balances mapping (address => uint256) public balanceOf; mapping (address => mapping (address => uint256)) public allowance; // This generates a public event on the blockchain that will notify clients event Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 value); // This generates a public event on the blockchain that will notify clients event Approval(address indexed _owner, address indexed _spender, uint256 _value); // This notifies clients about the amount burnt event Burn(address indexed from, uint256 value); /** * Constructor function * * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract */ function TokenERC20( uint256 initialSupply, string tokenName, string tokenSymbol ) public { totalSupply = initialSupply * 10 ** uint256(decimals); // Update total supply with the decimal amount balanceOf[msg.sender] = totalSupply; // Give the creator all initial tokens name = tokenName; // Set the name for display purposes symbol = tokenSymbol; // Set the symbol for display purposes } /** * Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract */ function _transfer(address _from, address _to, uint _value) internal { // Prevent transfer to 0x0 address. Use burn() instead require(_to != 0x0); // Check if the sender has enough require(balanceOf[_from] >= _value); // Check for overflows require(balanceOf[_to] + _value >= balanceOf[_to]); // Save this for an assertion in the future uint previousBalances = balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to]; // Subtract from the sender balanceOf[_from] -= _value; // Add the same to the recipient balanceOf[_to] += _value; emit Transfer(_from, _to, _value); // Asserts are used to use static analysis to find bugs in your code. They should never fail assert(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances); } /** * Transfer tokens * * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account * * @param _to The address of the recipient * @param _value the amount to send */ function transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) { _transfer(msg.sender, _to, _value); return true; } /** * Transfer tokens from other address * * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` on behalf of `_from` * * @param _from The address of the sender * @param _to The address of the recipient * @param _value the amount to send */ function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) { require(_value <= allowance[_from][msg.sender]); // Check allowance allowance[_from][msg.sender] -= _value; _transfer(_from, _to, _value); return true; } /** * Set allowance for other address * * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf * * @param _spender The address authorized to spend * @param _value the max amount they can spend */ function approve(address _spender, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) { allowance[msg.sender][_spender] = _value; emit Approval(msg.sender, _spender, _value); return true; } /** * Set allowance for other address and notify * * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf, and then ping the contract about it * * @param _spender The address authorized to spend * @param _value the max amount they can spend * @param _extraData some extra information to send to the approved contract */ function approveAndCall(address _spender, uint256 _value, bytes _extraData) public returns (bool success) { tokenRecipient spender = tokenRecipient(_spender); if (approve(_spender, _value)) { spender.receiveApproval(msg.sender, _value, this, _extraData); return true; } } /** * Destroy tokens * * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly * * @param _value the amount of money to burn */ function burn(uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) { require(balanceOf[msg.sender] >= _value); // Check if the sender has enough balanceOf[msg.sender] -= _value; // Subtract from the sender totalSupply -= _value; // Updates totalSupply emit Burn(msg.sender, _value); return true; } /** * Destroy tokens from other account * * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`. * * @param _from the address of the sender * @param _value the amount of money to burn */ function burnFrom(address _from, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) { require(balanceOf[_from] >= _value); // Check if the targeted balance is enough require(_value <= allowance[_from][msg.sender]); // Check allowance balanceOf[_from] -= _value; // Subtract from the targeted balance allowance[_from][msg.sender] -= _value; // Subtract from the sender's allowance totalSupply -= _value; // Update totalSupply emit Burn(_from, _value); return true; }} å°†ä»£ç å¤åˆ¶è¿‡å»ä¹‹åï¼Œå‘ç°åè¾¹ä¼šå‡ºç°ä¸‹æ‹‰æ¡†ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©â€œTokenâ€(å°±æ˜¯ä½ åˆçº¦çš„åå­—)ï¼Œç„¶åç‚¹å‡»æœ€ä¸‹é¢çš„â€œDEPLOYâ€ï¼Œåœ¨å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†ä¸­è¾“å…¥è´¦å·å¯†ç ç­‰å¾…äº¤æ˜“å®Œæˆã€‚ åˆ›å»ºä»£å¸ ç‚¹å‡»â€œCONTRACTâ€ä¼šå‘ç°åœ¨ç°è‰²èƒŒæ™¯çš„æ ç›®â€œCustom Contractsâ€ä¸­å¤šäº†åˆšåˆšåˆ›å»ºçš„åˆçº¦ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»å®ƒè¿›å…¥è¿™ä¸ªåˆçº¦ã€‚ åœ¨ç•Œé¢çš„å³ä¸‹è§’ä¸‹æ‹‰æ¡†é€‰æ‹©â€œToken ERC 20â€,ä¸‹é¢çš„è¾“å…¥æ¡†åˆ†åˆ«å¡«å†™ä»£å¸çš„å‘è¡Œé‡ã€å…·ä½“åç§° (æ¯”å¦‚Ethereum)ï¼Œä»£å¸ç¬¦å·(å°±æ˜¯ä»£å¸çš„å•ä½ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ETH)ï¼Œç„¶åç‚¹å‡»â€œEXECUTEâ€æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œè¾“å…¥è´¦å·å¯†ç ç­‰å¾…äº¤æ˜“å®Œæˆã€‚ äº¤æ˜“å®Œæˆåç‚¹å‡»â€œCONTRACTâ€æ‹‰åˆ°æœ€ä¸‹é¢ç‚¹å‡»åˆšåˆšåˆ›å»ºçš„ä»£å¸ï¼Œå¡«å†™ä»£å¸çš„åç§°ã€ç¬¦å·å’Œä½æ•°ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»OKä¿å­˜å¥½ä»£å¸çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚ é¦–é¡µç‚¹å‡»ä½ åˆ›å»ºä»£å¸çš„é’±åŒ…åœ°å€ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç°ä»¥å¤ªå¸ä½™é¢ä¸‹é¢å¤šå‡ºä¸€è¡Œä»£å¸çš„ä½™é¢ã€‚é¼ æ ‡ç§»ä¸Šå»ç‚¹å‡»Sendå³å¯å‘é€ä»£å¸äº¤æ˜“ã€‚

location:"12,34", timestamp:"1598509989", holder:"wang" }); fishes.push({ vessel:"å¥‹è¿›å·39A", location:"123,346", timestamp:"1598509989", holder:"gao" }); fishes.push({ vessel:"å¥‹è¿›å·40A", Error('éœ€è¦5ä¸ªå‚æ•°'); } var fish = { vessel:args[1], location:args[2], timestamp:args[3], holder:args[4] } await stub.putState(args[0],Buffer.from(JSON.stringify(fishes))); res.value.key; try { jsonRes.Record = JSON.parse(res.value.value.toString('utf8')); } catch (err) { console.log(err); jsonRes.Record = res.value.value.toString('utf8'); } allResults.push(jsonRes); } console.info('å¼€å§‹ï¼šæ›´æ”¹å½’å±äºº'); if (args.length != 2) { throw new Error('éœ€è¦2ä¸ªå‚æ•°'); } let fishAsBytes = await stub.getState(args[0]); let fish = JSON.parse(fishAsBytes); ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šä¸¤ä¸ªè´¦æˆ·è½¬è´¦ä¸æŸ¥è¯¢  mainimport ( "fmt" "github.com/hyperledger/fabric-chaincode-go/shim" "github.com/hyperledger/fabric-protos-go/peer" "strconv")type ChainCode struct{}func main() { ",err) }}//é“¾ç åˆå§‹åŒ–func (cc *ChainCode) Init(stub shim.ChaincodeStubInterface) peer.Response { fmt.Println("é“¾ç å®ä¾‹ä¾‹åŒ–") _, args := stub.GetFunctionAndParameters() var accountA, accountB string // å®šä¹‰è´¦å· var balanceA, balanceB int // å®šä¹‰ä½™é¢ var err error if len(args) != 4 { return shim.Error("å‚æ•°æ•°é‡é”™è¯¯") } // åˆå§‹åŒ–ä½™é¢ accountA = args[0] balanceA, err = strconv.Atoi(args[1]) if err != nil { return shim.Error("è¯·è¾“å…¥æ•´æ•°ä½™é¢") } accountB = args[2] balanceB, err = strconv.Atoi(args[3]) if err != nil { return shim.Error("è¯·è¾“å…¥æ•´æ•°ä½™é¢") } fmt.Printf("Aä½™é¢ = %d, Bä½™é¢ = %d
", balanceA, balanceB) // æ•°æ®ä¸Šé“¾ err = stub.PutState(accountA, []byte(strconv.Itoa(balanceA))) if err != nil { return shim.Error(err.Error()) } err = stub.PutState(accountB, []byte(strconv.Itoa(balanceB))) if err != nil { return shim.Error(err.Error()) } return shim.Success(nil)}//è°ƒç”¨é“¾ç func (cc *ChainCode) Invoke(stub shim.ChaincodeStubInterface) peer.Response { fmt.Println("é“¾ç è°ƒç”¨") function, args := stub.GetFunctionAndParameters() if function == "transfer" { // è½¬è´¦ return cc.transfer(stub, args) } else if function == "delete" { // åˆ é™¤è´¦æˆ· return cc.delete(stub, args) } else if function == "query" { //æŸ¥è¯¢ä½™é¢ return cc.query(stub, args) } else if function == "create" { //åˆ›å»ºè´¦æˆ· return cc.create(stub, args) } return shim.Error("è¯·è¾“å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„æ–¹æ³•å. æ–¹æ³•ååªèƒ½æ˜¯ "invoke" "delete" "query" "create"")}// ä»Aè´¦æˆ·è½¬ç§»èµ„äº§ç»™Bè´¦æˆ·func (cc *ChainCode) transfer(stub shim.ChaincodeStubInterface, args []string) peer.Response { var accountA, accountB string // å®šä¹‰è´¦å· var balanceA, balanceB int // å®šä¹‰ä½™é¢ var X int // äº¤æ˜“æ•°é‡ var err error if len(args) != 3 { return shim.Error("å‚æ•°æ•°é‡é”™è¯¯") } accountA = args[0] accountB = args[1] // è¯»å–ä½™é¢ balanceAbytes, err := stub.GetState(accountA) if err != nil { return shim.Error("è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥") } if balanceAbytes == nil { return shim.Error("æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è´¦å·ä¿¡æ¯") } balanceA, _ = strconv.Atoi(string(balanceAbytes)) balanceBbytes, err := stub.GetState(accountB) if err != nil { return shim.Error("è·å–æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥") } if balanceBbytes == nil { return shim.Error("æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è´¦å·ä¿¡æ¯") } balanceB, _ = strconv.Atoi(string(balanceBbytes)) // æ‰§è¡Œè½¬è´¦ X, err = strconv.Atoi(args[2]) if err != nil { return shim.Error("è½¬è´¦æ•°é‡å¿…é¡»æ˜¯æ•´æ•°") } if balanceA < X { return shim.Error("ä½™é¢ä¸è¶³") } balanceA = balanceA - X balanceB = balanceB + X fmt.Printf("è½¬è´¦åAä½™é¢ = %d, Bä½™é¢ = %d
", balanceA, balanceB) // æ•°æ®å†™å…¥è´¦æœ¬ err = stub.PutState(accountA, []byte(strconv.Itoa(balanceA))) if err != nil { return shim.Error(err.Error()) } err = stub.PutState(accountB, []byte(strconv.Itoa(balanceB))) if err != nil { return shim.Error(err.Error()) } return shim.Success(nil)}// åˆ é™¤æŸä¸ªè´¦æˆ·å®ä½“func (cc *ChainCode) delete(stub shim.ChaincodeStubInterface, args []string) peer.Response { if len(args) != 1 { return shim.Error("å‚æ•°æ•°é‡é”™è¯¯") } A := args[0] // åˆ é™¤æ•°æ® err := stub.DelState(A) if err != nil { return shim.Error("åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥") } return shim.Success(nil)}// æŸ¥è¯¢è´¦æˆ·çš„èµ„äº§ï¼Œå¯¹åº”peer chaincode queryfunc (cc *ChainCode) query(stub shim.ChaincodeStubInterface, args []string) peer.Response { var account string var err error if len(args) != 1 { return shim.Error("å‚æ•°æ•°é‡é”™è¯¯") } account = args[0] // ä»è´¦æœ¬ä¸­è·å–çŠ¶æ€ balanceAbytes, err := stub.GetState(account) if err != nil { jsonResp := "è·å–" + account + "æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥" return shim.Error(jsonResp) } if balanceAbytes == nil { jsonResp := "æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è´¦å·ä¿¡æ¯" return shim.Error(jsonResp) } jsonResp := "{"Name":"" + account + "","Amount":"" + string(balanceAbytes) + ""}" fmt.Printf("æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœ:%s
", jsonResp) return shim.Success(balanceAbytes)}//åˆ›å»ºè´¦æˆ·func (cc *ChainCode) create(stub shim.ChaincodeStubInterface, args []string) peer.Response { var account string var balanceA int var err error if len(args) != 2 { return shim.Error("å‚æ•°æ•°é‡é”™è¯¯") } // åˆå§‹åŒ–è´¦å·ä¿¡æ¯ account = args[0] balanceA, err = strconv.Atoi(args[1]) if err != nil { return shim.Error("ä½™é¢è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯") } fmt.Printf("balanceAä½™é¢ = %d
", balanceA) // å†™å…¥çŠ¶æ€åˆ°è´¦æœ¬ err = stub.PutState(account, []byte(strconv.Itoa(balanceA))) if err != nil { return shim.Error(err.Error()) } return shim.Success(nil)} å‚è€ƒæ–‡æ¡£è§†é¢‘ï¼š https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1554y1q7iE https://www.bilibili.com/video/[BV1zt411H7qX](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1zt411H7qX)/ æ–‡æ¡£ https://github.com/itheima1/hyperledger

entry.content: æœ¬æ–‡ä½œè€…ï¼šé™ˆè¿›åšä¸ªäººåšå®¢ï¼šhttps://jian1098.github.ioCSDNåšå®¢ï¼šhttps://blog.csdn.net/c_jianç®€ä¹¦ï¼šhttps://www.jianshu.com/u/8ba9ac5706b6è”ç³»æ–¹å¼ï¼šjian1098@qq.com ç®€ä»‹ ProtoBuf ï¼ˆGoogle Protocol Bufferï¼‰æ˜¯ç”±googleå…¬å¸ç”¨äºæ•°æ®äº¤æ¢çš„åºåˆ—ç»“æ„åŒ–æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå…·æœ‰è·¨å¹³å°ã€è·¨è¯­è¨€ã€å¯æ‰©å±•ç‰¹æ€§ï¼ŒåŒç±»å‹æœ‰å¸¸ç”¨çš„XMLåŠJSONï¼Œä½†å…·æœ‰æ›´å°çš„ä¼ è¾“ä½“ç§¯ã€æ›´é«˜çš„ç¼–ç ã€è§£ç èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«é€‚åˆäºæ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨ã€ç½‘ç»œæ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“ç­‰å¯¹å­˜å‚¨ä½“ç§¯ã€å®æ—¶æ€§è¦æ±‚é«˜çš„é¢†åŸŸï¼Œç›®å‰å·²ç»å‘å±•åˆ°protoc3 ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚ ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šç©ºé—´æ•ˆç‡é«˜ï¼Œæ—¶é—´æ•ˆç‡è¦é«˜ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ•°æ®å¤§å°æ•æ„Ÿï¼Œä¼ è¾“æ•ˆç‡é«˜çš„ ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šæ¶ˆæ¯ç»“æ„å¯è¯»æ€§ä¸é«˜ï¼Œåºåˆ—åŒ–åçš„å­—èŠ‚åºåˆ—ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶åºåˆ—ä¸èƒ½ç®€å•çš„åˆ†ææœ‰æ•ˆæ€§ åŸºæœ¬ç»“æ„ 123456789101112131415syntax="proto3"; //æ–‡ä»¶ç¬¬ä¸€è¡ŒæŒ‡å®šä½¿ç”¨çš„protobufç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æŒ‡å®šï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨proto2package services; //å®šä¹‰protoåŒ…å,å¯ä»¥ä¸º.protoæ–‡ä»¶æ–°å¢ä¸€ä¸ªå¯é€‰çš„packageå£°æ˜ç¬¦ï¼Œå¯é€‰option go_package = ".;services"; //å£°æ˜ç¼–è¯‘æˆgoä»£ç åçš„packageåç§°ï¼Œå¯é€‰çš„ï¼Œé»˜è®¤æ˜¯protoåŒ…åmessage ProdRequest{ //messaageå¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºgolangä¸­çš„ç»“æ„ä½“,å¯ä»¥åµŒå¥— int32 prod_id=1; //å˜é‡çš„å®šä¹‰æ ¼å¼ä¸ºï¼š[ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦][æ•°æ®ç±»å‹][å˜é‡å] = [å”¯ä¸€ç¼–å·] ,åŒä¸€ä¸ªmessageä¸­å˜é‡çš„ç¼–å·ä¸èƒ½ç›¸åŒ}message ProdResponse{ int32 pro_stock=1;}service ProdService{ //å®šä¹‰æœåŠ¡ rpc GetProdStock (ProdRequest) returns (ProdResponse); //rpcæ–¹æ³•} å˜é‡ç±»å‹ ProtoBuf Golang int32/sint32/sfixed32 int32 int64/sint64/sfixed64 int64 uint32/fixed32 uint32 uint64/fixed64 uint64 float float32 double float64 bool bool string string bytes []byte enum æ•°ç»„æˆ–slice google.protobuf.Timestamp timestamp.Timestamp å¤‡æ³¨ï¼šæœ€åçš„æ—¶é—´ç±»å‹golangéœ€è¦å¼•å…¥åŒ…github.com/golang/protobuf/ptypes/timestamp,å®šä¹‰å¦‚ä¸‹ 1t:=timestamp.Timestamp(time.Now().Unix()) ç„¶å.protpæ–‡ä»¶éœ€è¦å¯¼å…¥google/protobuf/timestamp.proto ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ repeatedå¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªå­—æ®µè¢«repeatedä¿®é¥°ï¼Œåˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºå®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨ç±»å‹çš„å­—æ®µï¼Œç›¸å½“äºgolangé‡Œçš„åˆ‡ç‰‡ 123message SearchRequest { repeated string args = 1 // åˆ—è¡¨ç±»å‹} reservedå¦‚æœä½ å¸Œæœ›å¯ä»¥é¢„ç•™ä¸€äº›æ•°å­—æ ‡ç­¾æˆ–è€…å­—æ®µå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨reservedä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ 12345message Foo { reserved 2, 15, 9 to 11; Countæ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢12db.Where("name = ?", "jinzhu").Or("name = ?", "jinzhu 2").Find(&users).Count(&count)// SELECT * from USERS WHERE name = 'jinzhu' OR name = 'jinzhu 2'; (users) å¤šæ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢12db.Where("role = ?", "admin").Or("role = ?", "super_admin").Not("name = ?", "jinzhu").Find(&users)db.Where("name <> ?","jinzhu").Where("age >= ? and role <> ?",20,"admin").Find(&users) æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®123456789 // ä½¿ç”¨ç»„åˆæ¡ä»¶æ›´æ–°å•ä¸ªå±æ€§db.Model(&user).Where("active = ?", true).Update("name", "hello")// UPDATE users SET name='hello', updated_at='2013-11-17 21:34:10' WHERE id=111 AND active=true;// ä½¿ç”¨`map`æ›´æ–°å¤šä¸ªå±æ€§ï¼Œåªä¼šæ›´æ–°è¿™äº›æ›´æ”¹çš„å­—æ®µdb.Model(&user).Updates(map[string]interface{}{"name": "hello", "age": 18, "actived": false})// ä½¿ç”¨`struct`æ›´æ–°å¤šä¸ªå±æ€§ï¼Œåªä¼šæ›´æ–°è¿™äº›æ›´æ”¹çš„å’Œéç©ºç™½å­—æ®µdb.Model(&user).Updates(User{Name: "hello", Age: 18}) åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®12345db.Where("email LIKE ?", "%jinzhu%").Delete(Email{})// DELETE from emails where email LIKE "%jinhu%";db.Delete(Email{}, "email LIKE ?", "%jinzhu%")// DELETE from emails where email LIKE "%jinhu%"; entry.content: æœ¬æ–‡ä½œè€…ï¼šé™ˆè¿›åšä¸ªäººåšå®¢ï¼šhttps://jian1098.github.ioCSDNåšå®¢ï¼šhttps://blog.csdn.net/c_jianç®€ä¹¦ï¼šhttps://www.jianshu.com/u/8ba9ac5706b6è”ç³»æ–¹å¼ï¼šjian1098@qq.com å®‰è£…æ‰©å±•12composer require bitwasp/bitcoin # BTCåº“ï¼Œéœ€è¦è¿è¡Œåœ¨64ä½çš„php7.0+ä¸Šcomposer require web3p/ethereum-util # ETHåº“ æ³¨æ„ï¼šä½¿ç”¨bitwaspåº“éœ€è¦å®‰è£…PHPçš„gmpæ‰©å±•ï¼Œä¸ç„¶ä¼šæŠ¥é”™Call to undefined function gmp_init()ï¼ŒLNMPç¯å¢ƒå®‰è£…gmpæ‰©å±•å¯ä»¥çœ‹æˆ‘çš„å¦ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ã€ŠLNMP1.6å®‰è£…gmpæ‰©å±•ã€‹ ç”ŸæˆåŠ©è®°è¯123456789101112131415161718192021222324<?phprequire_once './vendor/autoload.php';use BitWasp\Bitcoin\Address\PayToPubKeyHashAddress;use BitWasp\Bitcoin\Crypto\Random\Random;use BitWasp\Bitcoin\Key\Factory\HierarchicalKeyFactory;use BitWasp\Bitcoin\Mnemonic\Bip39\Bip39Mnemonic;use BitWasp\Bitcoin\Mnemonic\Bip39\Bip39SeedGenerator;use BitWasp\Bitcoin\Mnemonic\MnemonicFactory; //ç”ŸæˆåŠ©è®°è¯function createMnemonicWord(){ // Bip39 //$math = Bitcoin::getMath(); //$network = Bitcoin::getNetwork(); $random = new Random(); // ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºæ•°(initial entropy) $entropy = $random->bytes(Bip39Mnemonic::MIN_ENTROPY_BYTE_LEN); $bip39 = MnemonicFactory::bip39(); // é€šè¿‡éšæœºæ•°ç”ŸæˆåŠ©è®°è¯ $mnemonic = $bip39->entropyToMnemonic($entropy); // è¾“å‡ºåŠ©è®°è¯ echo $mnemonic; } åˆ›å»ºBTCåœ°å€123456789101112function createBtcAddress($mnemonicWord,$offset){ $seedGenerator = new Bip39SeedGenerator(); // é€šè¿‡åŠ©è®°è¯ç”Ÿæˆç§å­ï¼Œä¼ å…¥å¯é€‰åŠ å¯†ä¸²'hello' $seed = $seedGenerator->getSeed($mnemonicWord); echo "seed: " . $seed->getHex() . entry.content: æœ¬æ–‡ä½œè€…ï¼šé™ˆè¿›åšåšå®¢åœ°å€ï¼šhttps://jian1098.github.ioCSDNåšå®¢ï¼šhttps://blog.csdn.net/c_jianè”ç³»æ–¹å¼ï¼šjian1098@qq.com githubåœ°å€ï¼šhttps://github.com/jian1098/php-redis-binary-tree äºŒå‰æ ‘æ˜¯è½¯ä»¶å¼€å‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å¾ˆå¸¸è§çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡é€šè¿‡phpè¿›è¡ŒäºŒå‰æ ‘çš„ç”Ÿæˆå’Œéå†ï¼Œé€šè¿‡rediså°†äºŒå‰æ ‘å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å°†redisæ¢æˆå…¶ä»–çš„å…³ç³»å‹æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¯»å†™é€Ÿåº¦å˜›æ˜¯å·®æŒºè¿œçš„ã€‚ä»£ç ä¸­æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿçš„æ³¨é‡Šï¼Œåº”è¯¥ä¸éš¾æ‡‚ï¼Œä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒå’Œå­¦ä¹ ã€‚ é¦–å…ˆå°è£…äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„ç”Ÿæˆå’Œéå†ç®—æ³• tree.php 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108<?php// èŠ‚ç‚¹ç±»Class BTNode{ public $data; public $lChild; public $rChild; public function __construct($data = null) { $this->data = $data; }}// äºŒå‰æ ‘ç±»Class BinaryTree{ public $btData; public function __construct($data = null) { $this->btData = $data; } //åˆ›å»ºäºŒå‰æ ‘ public function CreateBT(&$root = null) { $elem = array_shift($this->btData); if ($elem == null) { return 0; } else if ($elem == '#') { $root = null; } else { $root = new BTNode(); $root->data = $elem; $this->CreateBT($root->lChild); $this->CreateBT($root->rChild); } return $root; } //å…ˆåºéå†äºŒå‰æ ‘ public function PreOrder($root) { if ($root != null) { echo $root->data . " "; $this->PreOrder($root->lChild); $this->PreOrder($root->rChild); } else { return; } } //ä¸­åºéå†äºŒå‰æ ‘ public function InOrder($root) { if ($root != null) { $this->InOrder($root->lChild); echo $root->data . " "; $this->InOrder($root->rChild); } else { return; } } //ååºéå†äºŒå‰æ ‘ public function PosOrder($root) { if ($root != null) { $this->PosOrder($root->lChild); $this->PosOrder($root->rChild); echo $root->data . " "; } else { return; } } //å±‚åº(å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆ)éå†äºŒå‰æ ‘ function LeverOrder($root) { $queue = new SplQueue();//åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ if ($root == null){ return; }else{ $queue->enqueue($root); } while (!$queue->isEmpty()) { $node = $queue->bottom(); $queue->dequeue(); echo $node->data . " "; if ($node->lChild){ $queue->enqueue($node->lChild); }else{// echo $node->data.'çš„å·¦å­æ ‘ä¸ºç©º'; } if ($node->rChild){ $queue->enqueue($node->rChild); }else{// echo $node->data.'çš„å³å­æ ‘ä¸ºç©º'; } } }} æ¥ç€å°è£…æ“ä½œredisçš„ç±» redis.php 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869<?phpclass MyRedis { private $redis; private $host; //redis ip private $port; //redis ç«¯å£ private $tree; public function __construct($host,$port){ $this->host=$host; $this->port=$port; //è¿æ¥redis if(class_exists('Redis')){ $this->redis = new \Redis(); if($this->redis->connect($this->host, $this->port)){ $this->connect=true; } }else{ exit('redisæ‰©å±•ä¸å­˜åœ¨'); } } //æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹ public function addNode($id,$data){ if(!is_array($data)){ return []; } $resOrder=$this->redis->hMSet($id,$data); return $resOrder; } //æŸ¥æ‰¾èŠ‚ç‚¹ public function getNode($id){ return $this->redis->hGetAll($id); } //ä¿®æ”¹æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å±æ€§ public function setNode($id,$field,$value){ return $this->redis->hSet($id,$field,$value); } //è·å–redisæ‰€æœ‰é”® public function getKeys(){ return $this->redis->keys('*'); } //è·å–keyçš„ä¸ªæ•° public function dbSize(){ return $this->redis->dbSize(); } //æ¸…ç©ºæ•°æ®åº“ public function flushDB(){ return $this->redis->flushDB(); } //å‰åºéå†çš„é¡ºåºå–å‡ºäºŒå‰æ ‘ public function tree($root_id){ $rootNode=$this->getNode($root_id); $this->tree[]=$root_id; if (isset($rootNode['left'])){ $this->tree($rootNode['left']); } if (isset($rootNode['right'])){ $this->tree($rootNode['right']); } return $this->tree; }} æœ€åè°ƒç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªç±»è¿›è¡ŒäºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å­˜å–å’Œéå† index.php 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970<?phprequire_once 'redis.php';require_once 'tree.php';$myredis=new MyRedis('127.0.0.1','6379');/* å‡è®¾æˆ‘æ„é€ ä¸€é¢—å¦‚ä¸‹çš„äºŒå‰æ ‘ 1 2 3 # 4 # # # #*///æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹//$data=[// 'left' => '2',// 'right' => '3',//];//$res=$myredis->addNode(1,$data);////$data=[// 'left' => '#',// 'right' => '4',//];//$res=$myredis->addNode(2,$data);////$data=[// 'left' => '#',// 'right' => '#',//];//$res=$myredis->addNode(3,$data);////$data=[// 'left' => '#',// 'right' => '#',//];//$res=$myredis->addNode(4,$data);//print_r($res);//ä¿®æ”¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¿¡æ¯//$res=$myredis->setNode(1,'left',2);//print_r($res);//æŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹//$res=$myredis->getNode(1);//print_r($res);//æ¸…ç©ºæ•°æ®//$res=$myredis->flushDB();//è·å–redisæ‰€æœ‰é”®//$res=$myredis->getKeys();//print_r($res);//å‰åºéå†çš„é¡ºåºä»redisè¯»å–èŠ‚ç‚¹$data=$myredis->tree(1);//$data = array(1,2,'#',4,'#','#',3,'#','#');//ç”ŸæˆäºŒå‰æ ‘$tree = new BinaryTree($data);$root = $tree->CreateBT();//éå†äºŒå‰æ ‘echo 'å‰åºï¼š';$tree->PreOrder($root);echo '<br>ä¸­åºï¼š';$tree->InOrder($root);echo '<br>ååºï¼š';$tree->PosOrder($root);echo '<br>å±‚åºï¼š';$tree->LeverOrder($root); æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœ 1234å‰åºï¼š1 2 4 3 ä¸­åºï¼š2 4 1 3 ååºï¼š4 2 3 1 å±‚åºï¼š1 2 3 4
